{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class Duration &gt;
std::chrono::leap_second_info
    get_leap_second_info( const std::chrono::utc_time&lt;Duration&gt;&amp; ut );
}}

Obtains a {{lc|std::chrono::leap_second_info}} whose {{tt|is_leap_second}} and {{tt|elapsed}} indicate whether {{c|ut}} is during a positive leap second insertion and the sum of leap seconds between 1 January 1970 and {{c|ut}}, respectively.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ut|UTC time to examine}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A {{tt|leap_second_info}} value specified above.
